name: import-metadata
label: Import Metadata
description: A utility for gradient guidance reconstruction
author: Flywheel SSE

column_map.description: A yaml mapping file to match column headers to metadata points.

subjectID_Column.description: The name of the column that contains subject ID's

first_row.description: The first row that contains data (usually the column headers)

sheets.description: If using an excel file, which sheet(s) should be imported (comma separated, 'sheet1, sheet2, etc')?  Note that each sheet must have a 'SubjectID Column'.

info_category.description: A parent metadata category to store store the info under.
